ANU.name: Zhicheng Su
ANU.biography: Dr. Zhicheng Su received his Ph.D. degree from the University of Hong Kong (HKU) in 2017. Currently he is working as a Postdoctral Fellow in Research School of Physics, the Australian National University (ANU). His research interests are in luminescence mechanisms and ultrafast processes in semiconducting materials and device structures.
